module.name: skeletonViewer
module.description: This module is responsible for displaying in real-time multiple skeletons in 3D.
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the BSD 3-Clause License.
module.description-long: This module is responsible for displaying in real-time multiple skeletons in 3D. It makes use of VTK.
